name: Space Station 13 RPG
description:
Year 2552.
You are an assistant - a crew member of space station 13, which suffers a catastrophe.
Arriving at the station, you will understand that in the advertising booklets much was lied about. Try to survive and find out who is behind all the troubles of the station. Perhaps you are the last hope of the station. Save it ... or burn it. meow


Space Station 13 RPG - The fan RPG with the elements of the quest, created by the universe of space station 13, the development has lasted for more than 2 years. The demo has received encouraging feedback from many communities in this universe.

Existing functions:

  • Nonlinear story. Your choice affects the station.
  • Familiar universe. Humor and color are preserved.
  • Pass the path from the assistant to the captain or take the dark side of the force.

Hey, Johnny, where's my money?

  • Will go to the translators who will translate into English and released in Steam.
